text.headline: My professional journey
text.text: From Architectural Engineer over HVAC Engineer to Data Engineer

media.caption: "Polystyrene/cardboard engineer"

text.headline: MSc Architectural Engineering
text.text:
Technical University of Denmark (DTU)

Initially "City and Building Engineer"

The middleman between the architect and the engineer

media.caption: Our proposal for an office building / kindergarden

text.headline: Bryghusgrunden
text.text:
A building at the Harbour front of Copenhagen.

Mix of a building and a cityscape assignment

Where the BLOX building is now located.

media.caption: Our proposal for a bridge at DTU

text.headline: Bridge
text.text:
Design of a pedestriant bridge at DTU

Main focus on FEM and calculations of welded joints

media.caption: Our proposal for a culture house

text.headline: Culture House
text.text:
Design a culture house at Utterslev Mose, Copenhagen.

Design the building + perform acoustic calculations on the concert hall.

media.caption: Internship as an architect

text.headline: Internship at Holm & Grut Architects
text.text: Designing a gym for an elementary school + an arrival hall at CPH airport.

media.caption: Effect of angled window opening

text.headline: Archline Zero
text.text:
A single family house that should meet the expected 2020 requirements for energy consumption.

2D heat flux and daylight calculations on special window design.

media.caption: Radiance-derived window shade and the effect on daylight access

text.headline: Diploma engineer thesis
text.text:
Energy Efficiency Retrofit of a residential building from the fifties.

Thermal simulations, daylight simulations, CFD, ventilation design.

media.caption: Students from all over the world

text.headline: AEC Global Teamwork
text.text:
Stanford course that has existed since 1993.

Main focus is communication using ICT.

media.caption: iD-BIM

text.headline: Virtual Construction from a Management Perspective
text.text:
Location based scheduling.

Concept for a new BIM-based consultant role.

Mockup of an app for on-site planning.

media.caption: Our proposal for an educational facility at DTU

text.headline: Integrated Functional Project
text.text:
Deigning an educational facility at DTU.

Parametric window design using evolutionary algorithm.

Low-preasure ventilation system.

media.caption: Measurement results from full-scale experiment

text.headline: Ventilation course
text.text: Practical course with 1-1 experiments in climate chambers.

media.caption: Data flow for HVAC design

text.headline: Master's thesis
text.text:
An integrated data driven approach to HVAC design.

The basis of my later research.

text.headline: Graduated and done with uni!
text.text: Consulting Engineer in HVAC department.

text.headline: Axel Towers
text.text:
Office building in central Copenhagen.

Architect: Lundgaard & Tranberg
Turnkey Contractor: ZÃ¼blin

- 2D project
- Challenging geometry and uncompromising architect
- Spatial database for HVAC sizing
- Radiant cooling/heating

media.caption: Pretty happy with my job but tired of putting out fires

text.headline: Potential PhD position
text.text:
Christian Anker Hviid:
"Mads! We are applying for a PhD position and you are the perfect candidate!"


Me:
"No way!"

media.caption: Mechanical model

text.headline: Bispebjerg Hospital lab&log
text.text:
Laboratory and Logistics building.

Animal stables and GMO laboratories.

media.caption: Back to uni!

text.headline: PhD application approved
text.text: Officially an Industrial PhD student and whole new challenges await.

text.headline: NIRAS
text.text:
ALECTIA is merged with NIRAS

From 700 colleagues to 2500 colleagues and lots of new opportunities as NIRAS.

media.caption: Room history allows you to see how the layout has changed over time

text.headline: WeBIM
text.text: Web-BIM platform for providing engineers with insights.

text.headline: Aarhus University Digital Twin
text.text: Semantic data model of campus, buildings, spaces, sensors and mechanical system.

media.caption: Map with space polygons retrieved from ScienceCity data hub

text.headline: ScienceCity Lyngby
text.text:
Democratic access to data. I provide my data and we can all use and analyze a common dataset.

Querying over various data sources using Comunica

media.caption: Deliverables in the BART project

text.headline: BART
text.text:
Track A: Building Solibri rule sets for checking danish building regulations

Track B: Investigating new methods (including Linked Data)

media.caption: Test model for the case study

text.headline: ConTech Pioneer project 5
text.text:
Saint Gobain: "Why do architects make detailed drawings of walls when they are bought as systems?"
"What if they could just focus on establishing the boundary conditions?"

text.headline: K4A

kobl 4 architecture

Formalization of design frames and checks that are continiously checked against.

text.text:
Digital project delivery for all subsidized residential buildings in Denmark

- Examination declarations
- Document and model checking
